vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.26.35;
son of: Ephraim (H0669);
brother of: Shuthelah (H7803), Becher (H1071H), Ezer (H5827), Elead (H0496) and Beriah (H1283H)
Group of ta.chan (תַּ֫חַן "Tahan" H8465)
§ Tahanites = see Tachan "thou will decline"
descendants of Tachan, son of Telah, an Ephraimite
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Tahán; tribu de Efraín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
他罕族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 他罕 "汝將衰落"
以法蓮人他拉的兒子,他罕的後裔(民 26:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
他罕族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 他罕 "汝将衰落"
以法莲人他拉的儿子,他罕的后裔(民 26:35)
